graveyardPanel - Variable in class ChessPanel
 
GraveyardPanel - Class in <Unnamed>
The GraveyardPanel is a JPanel that displays the difference between the pieces on the board and the number of pieces that should be on a normal chess board.

Constructor for the GraveyardPanel.
